text: Makoto Uehara (; born November 14, 1984) is a Japanese Shidokan Karateka and heavyweight kickboxer competing in K-1. ==Biography and career == He faced Hiromi Amada at the K-1 World Grand Prix 2012 in Tokyo Final 16 on October 14, 2012K-1 Final 16 Matches UnveiledK-1 WGP Final 16, Finalized Fight Card For This Sunday, October 14 and won via unanimous decision.K-1 World Grand Prix Final 16 Live Results Despite qualifying for the K-1 World Grand Prix 2012 Final, Uehara was left out in the cold when the event rolled around and was replaced by the higher-ranked Pavel Zhuravlev.K-1 WGP Final 8 Match-Ups Uehara defeated Kengo Shimizu by way of split decision at RISE 92 in Tokyo on March 17, 2013 to win the RISE 90 kg title.RISE 92 Results: Yamamoto Edges Bennoui, Umeno Avenges Loss He was set to fight Dustin Jacoby at Glory 12: New York - Lightweight World Championship Tournament in New York City on November 23, 20134 more fights confirmed for Glory 12 in New York but the match was switched to Glory 13: Tokyo - Welterweight World Championship Tournament in Tokyo, Japan on December 21, 2013.The GLORY 13 Card is Super Stacked So Far4 more bouts confirmed for Glory 13 including main event between Daniel Ghita and Errol Zimmerman He defeated Jacoby by split decision.GLORY SuperFight Series Tokyo and GLORY 13 SpoilersGlory 13 Results and Recap Glory 13 Tokyo results and gifs: Rico Verhoeven, Daniel Ghita, and Nieky Holzken win big in JapanGLORY 13 Results: Verhoeven, Ghita and Holzken pick up victories ==Titles== * 2013 RISE 90 kg champion * 2011 RISE Heavyweight
